Translated_Text: The old man went to his work,
POS: n	prt	prt	v	n	post

Translated_Text: “Where might my machete be?”, he asked.
So he went looking for it.
He went back into the house.
His machete was under his arm.

Translated_Text: “Father, your machete is the one under your arm.”
